Project History

Changelog

Stay up to date with the latest features, improvements, and fixes.

2.0.0

Prompt-as-a-Service (SDK & API)

February 21, 2026

Major Release

"A transformative internal engineering update that turns PromptForge into a production-ready Service. Introducing the official SDK, unified API schema, and a multi-page Documentation Hub."

added

  • Official Node.js SDK: Released `promptforge-server-sdk` on npm with full TypeScript support, intelligent caching, and sub-50ms latency.
  • Developer Center: Created a multi-page documentation hub with dedicated paths for SDK (`/docs/sdk`) and REST API (`/docs/api`).
  • REST API v1: Standardized the public execution endpoint with rich metadata, token usage stats, and cascaded model routing.
  • Rich Error Objects: New machine-readable error handling system with actionable fixes for faster integration.

changed

  • Unified Naming: Standardized on `PromptForgeClient` for better developer experience across all platforms.
  • Schema Calibration: Synchronized internal snake_case API fields with SDK CamelCase properties for seamless DX.
  • Documentation Overhaul: Premium, high-performance documentation layout with breadcrumbs and contextual navigation.

fixed

  • Memory & Performance: Implemented Singleton patterns for backend AI clients, resolving high RAM usage and improving stability.
  • Timeout Resolution: Fixed intermittent timeouts on prompt execution through optimized injection logic.

1.4.0

Badge Notifications

February 03, 2026

Update

"A polish update introducing a sophisticated notification system for gamification achievements."

added

  • Badge Notification System: New global popup system for earnable badges.
  • Visual Polish: Rarity-colored toasts and confetti celebrations for high-tier achievements.
  • Global Context: Centralized provider for triggering notifications from anywhere.

1.3.0

Strategy & Aesthetics

February 03, 2026

Major Release

"Official rollout of our India-first pricing strategy and a complete visual polish of the core experience."

changed

  • Pricing Strategy: Introduced new ₹0 Hobbyist vs ₹99/mo Pro plans (India-First).
  • Home Page: Applied premium fade-in animations to all major sections for a seamless flow.
  • Admin Profile: Replaced generic crown icon with the official 'Approved' badge.

added

  • 4-Key API Architecture: Intelligent load balancing with dedicated keys for Fixer, Playground, and Analysis.
  • Usage Limits: Implemented soft-limits for Pro (500/day) and hard-limits for Free (15/day).
  • Safety Logic: Graceful degradation during high traffic instead of raw error messages.

1.2.0

Gamification & Playground

February 02, 2026

Major Release

"A massive update introducing gamified learning, badges, and a comprehensive playground suite."

added

  • Gamification System: Comprehensive badge and achievement system with 15+ unique badges.
  • Playground: New interactive learning area with Fixer, Builder, Battle, and Precision modes.
  • Profile Achievements: Dedicated section to showcase earned badges and level progress.
  • Onboarding: Interactive 'How to Play' guides for all game modes.

changed

  • Home Page: Replaced demo button with direct access to Playground.
  • Security: Protected /playground routes with authentication middleware.
  • Performance: Optimized badge fetching with Service Role clients for reliability.

1.1.0

Accounts & SEO

February 01, 2026

Update

"Focus on user identity management and discoverability."

added

  • Profile Editing: Full sync between Clerk and Supabase for avatars and names.
  • SEO Suite: Enhanced metadata, OpenGraph tags, and sitemap generation.
  • Verification: Google Site Verification integration.

fixed

  • Fixed type safety issues in Analysis Panel.
  • Resolved missing icon imports in production builds.

1.0.0

Initial Launch

January 25, 2026

Major Release

"The foundation of PromptForge Studio. Studio, A/B Testing, and Granular Controls."

added

  • Studio: Advanced Prompt Editor with Cognitive Depth controls.
  • A/B Arena: Side-by-side prompt comparison laboratory.
  • Granular Controls: Sliders for Temperature, Top-P, and Top-K.
  • Infrastructure: Clerk Auth + Supabase DB + Next.js 15.

Transforming raw intent into production-grade AI prompts.
Built for the next generation of creators.
